answers.answer: I'm so glad you are doing well on the switch in meds!  I'm sure others will be happy to stop by with their personal experiences.  Your doctor, too, should be able to help answer some questions about your medicine, as well as your pharmacist who has up-to-date info.J~

question: Hi. I've been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes.  My dr had me on, originally metformin but wasn't working.  So he added invokana and it works beautifully.  The only problem is I heard it was too new. Does anyone know any information on invokana whether good or bad . I would appreciate it. Thanks
title: invokana
